name: RandomFacts
0:
”Alexa, open random facts”
”Alexa, launch random facts”
”Alexa, start random facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random facts
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Random Facts is a funny trivia skill that gives you random fun facts from all over the world! Try this skill with your family and friends to hear new fun facts together!

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

- Enable this Alexa skill.
- On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
- Click + to add a new routine.
- Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
- Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
- Choose "Your Skills".
- Select this skill.
- Click Next.
- Choose Device to perform the routine to.
- Click Save.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
